Tyrael examined the data. He had seen only one such similar sample of 
a phenomenon, and it came from the readings brought back by a maximal 
shuttle... manned by Primal and his crew.

Tyrael: This is a wormhole... The bastard did it... He went back for 
Earth... Talon! Get us in that hole! We'll chase him throughout the 
galaxy if we have to! Shadow Star, cut the power of all cannons except 
one, Naga, boost the shields with this power. Hang on to something, 
this is likely to be a rough ride...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14" <black_ben14@h...> wrote:
> "Understood!" Naga said and started taping some keys rapidly "Ok 
> here's what I got..."he send the datas on the screen.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Tyrael's mind raced as he suspected what had happened to the 
ships. 
> > No, he wouldn't... Megatron wouldn't go back there...
> > 
> > Tyrael: Shadow Star, shoot those debris. The last thing we'd need 
> now 
> > is a breach in the hull. Naga, get me the data you have gathered 
> about 
> > this hole, whatever that is, on the big screen.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14" <black_ben14@h...> wrote:
> > > "Oki!" said Naga while taking his seat.Just when he looked at 
the 
> > > screen his face was surprised."Tyreal,there's somekind of black 
> hole 
> > > or somethings." he raise a lever "Shield power is getting 
> > > higher,50%,60%,70%,80%,90%,100% the shield is now at maximum 
> power!"
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > > Shadow Star got to the cannons and targeted a few
> > > > pieces of space debris without actually firing to get
> > > > the feel of them.
> > > > 
> > > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > OOC: Naga should see the warp by now.
> > > > > 
> > > > > The Night Star advanced in the void of space. The
> > > > > Tripredacus ship was 
> > > > > near to the point where the two previous ships had
> > > > > disappeared.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Tyrael: Strikers, somewhere around here, two ships
> > > > > were lost on 
> > > > > sensors. One of them is the Predacon ship. Everyone
> > > > > to their station. 
> > > > > Shadow Star, man the cannons. Talon you get the
> > > > > pilot's seat. Naga, 
> > > > > signal anything you cath on sensors and raise the
> > > > > shield at maximum 
> > > > > available power.
> > > > > 
> > > > >
